Package weka.gui.beans

Class ChartEvent

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
weka.gui.beans.ChartEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChartEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
Event encapsulating info for plotting a data point on the StripChart
Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Mark Hall
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • ChartEvent

      public ChartEvent​(java.lang.Object source, java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> legendText, double min, double max, double[] dataPoint, boolean reset)
      Creates a new ChartEvent instance.
      Parameters:
      source - the source of the event
      legendText - a vector of strings to display in the legend
      min - minimum y value
      max - maximum y value
      dataPoint - an array of y values to plot
      reset - true if display is to be reset

    • ChartEvent

      public ChartEvent​(java.lang.Object source)
      Creates a new ChartEvent instance.

      source - the source of the event
